definition: A person or entity that provides goods or services to another party, typically on a regular basis, often in a commercial or business context. This term is commonly used to refer to suppliers, vendors, or providers of products or services.

examples.german: Der Lieferant bringt die Ware pünktlich.
examples.english: The supplier delivers the goods on time.

examples.german: Unser Lieferant hat eine große Auswahl an Produkten.
examples.english: Our supplier has a wide range of products.

examples.german: Der Lieferant liefert die Bestellung direkt an unsere Tür.
examples.english: The supplier delivers the order directly to our door.

examples.german: Wir haben einen zuverlässigen Lieferanten gefunden.
examples.english: We have found a reliable supplier.

examples.german: Der Lieferant bietet auch Expresslieferungen an.
examples.english: The supplier also offers express deliveries.
